tuv.seg: Eligibility for Membership of the European Parliament
Intofa mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa
The European Parliament is the institution that represents the citizens of the Member States
Is Parlaimint na hEorpa í an institiúid a hionadaíonn na saoránaigh de bhallstát
To be eligible for election as a member of the European Parliament (i.e., an MEP), there are certain criteria you must fulfil:
Le bheith intofa mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa:
• You must be a citizen of Ireland or a resident EU citizen
• Ní mór duit a bheith i do shaoránach Éireananch nó saoránach cónáitheach den AE
• You must be over 21 years of age and
• Ní mór duit a bheith ós cionn 21 bliain d'aois agus
• You must not be disqualified from election to the Dáil
• Ní féidir leat a bheith dícháilithe le toghadh mar Theachta Dála
To stand for election, you must be nominated for election
Le seasamh sa toghchán, ní mór duit a bheith ainmnithe
You are disqualified from membership of the European Parliament if:
Tá tú dícháilithe mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa:
• you are not a citizen of Ireland or a national of another Member State in the EU
• Muna bhfuil tú i do shaoránach Éireannach nó i do náisiúnach de bhallstát eile den AE
• you have not yet reached 21 years of age
• Má tá tú faoi bliain 's fiche d'aois
• you are a candidate for election in another member state
• Más iarrthóir toghcháin in aon bhallstát eile thú
• you are a national of another Member State and you may not stand as a candidate for election in that Member State because of a law in that Member State
• Más náisiúnach de Bhallstát eile thú agus nach féidir leat seasamh sa Bhallstát sin de bharr an dlí atá i bhfeidhm sa Bhallstát sin
• you are a judge or the Comptroller and Auditor General
• Más breitheamh thú nó an tArd-Reachtaire Ciste agus Cuntas
• you are a member of the Garda Siochana
• Más ball den Gharda Síochána thú
• you are a whole-time member of the Defence Forces
• Más ball lánaimseartha de na Fórsaí Cosanta thú
• you are a civil servant and it does not specifically state in your contract of employment that you may be a member of the European Parliament
• Más státseirbhíseach thú, muna bhfuil sé luaite go sonrach i do chonradh fostaíochta go bhfuil cead agat seasamh mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa
• you are a person of unsound mind
• Má tá galar intinne ort
• you are presently in prison serving a term greater than 6 months
• Má tá tú sa phríosún ag cur isteach téarma níos mó ná 6 mhí

If you are the Attorney General, the Ceann Comhairle of the Dáil, the Cathaoirleach of the Seanad or a Minister of State and you are elected to the European Parliament, you will cease to hold your original post on the day you are elected to the European Parliament

Más tú an tArd Aighne, Ceann Comhairle na Dála, Cathaoirleach an tSeanaid nó Aire Stáit agus má thoghtar tú mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa tiocfaidh deireadh le do thréimhse sa phost sin ar an lá a thoghtar thú mar bhall de Pharlaimint na hEorpa
View a list of existing Members of the European Parliament (MEP's) here
Féach liosta de na Baill atá ar Pharlaimint na hEorpa cheana féin anseo
There is more information on european elections on the website of the Department of Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government
Tá tuilleadh eolais maidir le toghcháin na hEorpa ar láithreán gréasáin na Roinne Tithíochta, Pleanála​​, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil
